transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sollunga sir.
Executive: Sollunga sir.
Executive: Sollunga sir, order delivery no abdinna maari phone pannirukom sir.
Customer: Sollunga sir.
Executive: Order delivery no abdinna maari inform pannirunthom illingala.
Customer: Aama aama order onnu idhula oru 10, 15 naal aachu pottu vitturundhen. Ellame order accept panni thaan vitturukiren.
Executive: Enquiry edhume irundha maari illiye.
Executive: Step by step thaan sir company vandhu paathinganna list out aagum. Namma irukkuradhume basic listing thaan. Seringala IndiaMART la startup plan andha starting unkitta onboard aagurappe solliruppanga illaiya.
Customer: Puriyala puriyala eppadi?
Executive: Onboard aagurappe unga kitta solliruppanga illaiya.
Customer: Onboard aaguradhunna puriyala.
Executive: Starting varurappe unga kitta andha paathinganna solliruppanga illaiya. Idhu vandhu paathinganna oru basic listing plan thaan. IndiaMART la startup aana plan thaan. Appadinnu thaan sollirundhaangala. So conversion unga field la thaan sir irukku.
Customer: Aama sir namma idhunaal varaikum potturundhom la. Ivvalavu naal namma vandhu namma daily adhaavadhu andha appa use pannama onnum illa. Namma use pannittu thaan irukkurom. Just oru enquiry oda innu varaikum accept aagala illa.
Executive: Adhe thaan sir sir conversion unga field la thaan sir irukku. IndiaMART vandhu match making andha platform thaan. So ivvalavu thaan ungaloda supplying capacity appadinnu system search panni adhukku etha maari enquiry thaan sir ungalukku vandhu paathinganna promote aagum. Unga kitta starting la irukkavanga enna sir sonnaanga vandhu unga kitta vandhu paathinganna pesinaanga illingala. Ungala ulla kondu vandhu.
Customer: Adhu ovvorutharum ovvoru maari pesittu irundhaanga naalukku kanakula aaiyaachu. Ippo adhellam problem pannama sollunga. Avangallam enna sonnaanga sir enna unga kitta.
Customer: Order basic ki regular a ungalukku varum vaikkum appadingara maari thaan sonnaanga innu varaikum namakku oru varaikum oru enquiry oda andha call idhoda varala.
Executive: Call illame varum sir order andha call eppadinnu vandhu paathinganna based on market la ulla situation poruthu thaan call vandhu paathinganna varum. Seri seringala order vandhu paathinganna unga kayila thaan irukku. IndiaMART vandhu paathinganna oru tool thaan. Just oru platform thaan ungalukku oru match making panna oru platform thaan. Hmm neengalaam business neengalaam vandhu paathinganna convert pandra maari irukkum. Eduthavane order vandhurum eduthavane 10 laksham rooba business vandhurum appadillaam kidaiyaadhu. Adhe illa oru 50 roobaikku kooda innu order varala adhukku thaan kekkaren.
Executive: Basic thaan sir. Naan vandhu enna solren naan neenga solra ungalukku namma time spend panni enna enna enquiry vandhurukku adha namma adha andha app la adha thatti vida sonnaanga appodhaan avangalukku andha idhu reach aagumnnaanga adhellam namma regular a thatti vittuttu thaan irukkaren.
Customer: Hmm hmm oru naalukku eththanai idhu undu?
Executive: Onnu thaan sir oru naalukku.
Customer: Oru naalukku onnu thaana mothaththula yearly ki?
Customer: Idaiyila rendo moono sonna maari irundhu starting la aarambikkumbodhu.
Executive: Illa illa oru naalukku onnu thaan.
Customer: Oru naalukku oru 17 evvalavo sonna maari irundhu sir.
Executive: Vaaram 17 sir.
Customer: Hmm oru naalukku onnu vaaram paathinganna moththam 17.
Customer: Vaaram 17 na ungalukku reasonable a appuram divide pannineenganna eththanai.
Executive: Illa sir vaaram 10 sir oru naalukku onnu moththamaa 17.
Customer: Maasaththukku 17 aa?
Executive: Vaaraththukku 10 lead sir oru naalukku onnu moththamaa 17 lead oru vaaraththukku purinjidhungala.
Customer: Seri hmm idhunaan evvalavu use pannirukkennu eppadi naan check panna mudiyum?
Executive: Ungaloda performance report card irukku illaiya unga mobile la keela scroll down panni paathinganna ungalukku performance report card irukkum.
Customer: Eppadi?
Executive: Unga mobileukku hmm home click pannikkonga seri adhula keela appadiye scroll down panni paathinganna ungalukku performance report appadinnu maari kaamikkkum.
Customer: Moonu dot la vachi idhu paakkanuma?
Executive: Moonu dot laam illa sir home nu oru option irukkaa?
Customer: Aamaa adhula appadiye mela konjam scroll down pannineenganna ungalukku kaamikkkum sir performance report nu.
Customer: Konjam appadiye mela thalli paarunga sir.
Customer: Performance score card nu onnu irukku.
Executive: Adha click pannikkonga sir.
Customer: Click pannalaam?
Executive: Aamaa sir adha click pannikkonga.
Customer: Click pannalaam?
Executive: Okay adhula ungalukku by leads appadinnu maari kaamikidhaa?
Customer: Loading aagudhu.
Customer: Adhula ippo enna enna paakkanum?
Executive: By leads.
Customer: Aama by lead irukku.
Executive: Adhu thaan neenga evvalavu by lead eduthingalo andha by leads fullaave.
Customer: Indha oru naalukku onnu edukkala nu vaingala adhu vandhu thirumbi irukkumaa?
Executive: Illa sir close aayirum.
Customer: Ippo unga oru naalukku eppadiyo oru lead edukkanum.
Executive: Aama oru lead edukkanum aama.
Customer: Ippo 23, 24 la onnu nu kaattudhu 16 22 adhula ellaam ezhu nu kaattudhu adhu enna procedure?
Customer: Enna sir?
Customer: Illa illa andha 16 naal la ezhu lead eduthurukkeenga seringala vaarathukku vaarathukku 19 lirundhu 15 aam thedhilirundhu moonu naalukku aaru lead eduthurukkeenga adhe maari 16 lirundhu 22 kaattudhaa?
Customer: Aamaa adhula enna na naal naalukku ezhu lead eduthurukkeenga 23, 24 la enna na oru naalukku oru lead eduthurukkeenga purinjidhungala.
Customer: Adhaavadhu 16 lirundhu 15 9 lirundhu 15 kulla aaru lead eduthurukkom date kulla appadiththaane.
Executive: Aamaa sir vaaraththula aamaa.
Customer: Adhu vandhu weekly yo andha idhu vandhu 16 to 22 vandhu weekly appadiththaane.
Executive: Aamaanga sir.
Customer: Seri okay seri ippo 23 to 24 nu irukkuradhu vandhu adhu vandhu days naalukku mattum sollirukkaanga date la.
Customer: Seri paappom enna enna condition la varumnu paakkalaam seri okay.
Executive: Step by step thaan idhula vandhu paathinganna increase aagum sir seringala.
Customer: Seri okay paakkaren namma vandhu innum rendu perai ulla kondu varannu thaan paakkaren idhu thaan. Seri avanga namakkitta enna pa idhu enna namakkitta kekkumbodhu innum varalannu thaan namma solla mudiyum appadiththaane kekkumbodhu.
Executive: Online poruththavarakkum step by step thaan sir namma company list out aagum. Seri neenga offline laiye oru business eduthuruppinga oru varushaththile business 70% business vandhurukkumaannu kandippaa kidaiyaadhu correct thungala.
Customer: Direct enquiry la sir. Aama direct aa oruthara deal pannuvaanga appadi poirumnu vaingala.
Executive: Direct aa ippo poi paakkareenga adhu thaan andha enquiry direct aa oru order varum adhu mooliyamaa naal business pannuvaanga appadi thaan sir pogum adhe maari thaan sir online um. Adhe maari thaan sir online um.
Customer: Seri sir paakkaren eppodhaan sir varum.
Executive: Seri sir seri ippo enakku ippo naan vandhu paathinganna naan close pandren sir seringala.
Customer: Puriyala.
Executive: Ippo naan vandhu paathinganna naan close pandren seringala so enakkaana vandhu paathinganna feedback ungalukku varum sir seringala.
Customer: Seri.
Executive: Seri neenga konjam positive aa koduthinganna enakku konjam supportive aa irukkum sir.
Customer: Seri sir okay.
Executive: Seri sir okay thank you sir thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received enough buyleads.

- Believes the initial sales pitch was misleading.

- Wants to know how to check usage.



Resolution:

- Explained IndiaMART is a matchmaking platform.

- Explained lead generation depends on market situation.

- Showed how to check performance report on the app.

- Clarified lead allocation is weekly, not daily.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will monitor the situation.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, performance, app usage
